# addressAsString()

**Instance Method**

Convience routine to get the HCI controller’s Bluetooth address as an NSString object.

## Declaration

```swift
func addressAsString() -> String!
```

## Return Value

Returns NSString *. nil if the address could not be retrieved.
title: addressAsString()
